General.Name: Zen Voce
General.Description: Zen Voce Corporation manufactures and sells semiconductor assembly and testing equipment in Taiwan and internationally. It engages in the design and manufacture of IC packaging machines and bumping products; wafer cutting and cleaning machines; and board cutting and cleaning machines. The company also designs and manufactures test products, such as wafer test probe card PCBs; IC test HIFIX and CHANG kits; SOCKET IC test products; IC handlers; and SOCKET IC burn-in test products, as well as offers dicing and jig saws, tapes, and ball mount tooling products. It serves semiconductors, optoelectronics, microelectronics, and LCD equipment industries. The company was formerly known as Trutek Cooperation. Zen Voce Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 53, Jinggong Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
